testcase.name: Validar erro ao enviar application key invalido
testcase.system-out: * def result = callonce read('../../claroApp/authentication/signin.feature@login') . passed * header Authorization = 'Bearer ' + result.idmToken ...................... passed * header X-Application-Key = xappkey ...................................... passed * url inventoryUrl ........................................................ passed * header X-Application-Key = 'auhdaiuhdaiuhds' ............................ passed * header document = document .............................................. passed Given path 'device-management/' + deviceId ................................ passed When method delete ........................................................ passed Then status 403 ........................................................... passed
